mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movies (title, running_time, release_date, end_date, genre, poster_img) VALUES (#{title}, #{runningTime}, #{releaseDate}, #{endDate}, #{genre}, #{posterImg})
mapper.update: UPDATE movies SET title = #{title}, running_time = #{runningTime}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, genre = #{genre}, poster_img = #{posterImg} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(title) > 17 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(title, 1, 18), '...') ELSE title END AS title, poster_img AS posterImg FROM movies WHERE release_date <= CURRENT_DATE AND end_date >= CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT id, CASE WHEN CHAR_LENGTH(title) > 17 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(title, 1, 17), '...') ELSE title END AS title, poster_img AS posterImg FROM movies WHERE release_date > CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY release_date ASC LIMIT 8
